question:
With regards to the recent announcement of the Indian Railway Management Service/ IRMS, consider the following statements:
  1. The personnel for IRMS will be selected through UPSC examination.
  2. The CEO is selected only from the Indian Railway Service.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Indian railways recently announced the merger of 8 services into a single service called IRMS or Indian Railway Management Service. The personnel for the railways will be selected through UPSC prelims exam. The aspirants can indicate preference for any of the 5 specialities under IRMS after clearing the prelims. Statement 2 is correct: The chairman of the Indian Railways is also to be the Chief Executive Officer. The CEO is to be selected only from the Indian Railway Service and no other service. The IRS officer needs to have at least 35 years of experience for being eligible for the post of CEO.
